DOC.brief_summary: The objective study assess atrial fibrillation ( AF ) episode detection use SJM ( St. Jude Medical ) Confirm ICM ( Implantable Cardiac Monitor ) .
DOC.criteria: The subject implant SJM Confirm ICM , DM2102 . The subject suspect paroxysmal AF . The subject ≥ 18 year age . The subject willing able provide write Informed Consent ( prior investigational related procedure ) . The subject persistent ( > 7 day ≤1 year require cardioversion ) , longstanding persistent ( continuous AF > 1 year ) permanent AF ( attempt restore sinus rhythm ) . The subject AF reversible etiology ( e.g . electrolyte imbalance , thyroid disease ) . The subject contraindication Holter recording . The subject already receive active implantable medical device SJM Confirm ICM , DM2102 . The subject unable comply follow schedule . The subject participate another investigational device drug investigation . The subject pregnant planning become pregnant duration investigation .
